entries.journal_entry_description: Boba Fett has employed you. It's usually a good idea to do what he suggests. People that don't play their cards right against Fett has a habit of catching a case of death.
entries.journal_entry_title: Working for Boba Fett, phase III
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Try to find the secret research laboratory on the planet of Dantooine.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Search the Warren for clues to who Durge is and his whereabouts.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: There wasn't much data on the working terminal that you find. Maybe someone in the Warren have better information on the background of Durge.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The scientist claims to know more about what he calls Project Durge. He has stashed project data in the tavern of the mining outpost. If you protect him from the Droids that won't let anyone leave the lab, he will give you the password to the datapad with the information. He's promised to give you the password to the data if you take him out of the Warren.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Talk to the scientist and get the password to the datapad he hid in the back of the tavern.
entries.task11_message_box_text: We needed that scientist alive. Come back and talk to me again...we will figure something out.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Return to Fett, you're going to have to try again.
